# Digital Crunch: AI Systems. Leads. Sales. 24x7.

> AI automation implementation for high-stakes businesses. Voice agents, lead generation, reputation management, AI search optimization, custom automation, and AI system security - engineered by a cybersecurity professional with 25 years experience and 31 certifications.

## Core Entity Information
- **Brand Name**: Digital Crunch
- **Legal Name**: James Fraze LLC
- **Location**: 2042 Quail Run Rd, Wylie, TX 75098
- **Primary Expertise**: AI Automation Implementation and Cybersecurity Engineering
- **Contact**: +1 (945) 245-4257
- **Website**: https://digitalcrunch.com
- **Booking**: https://jamesfraze.com
- **Parent Operation**: Technical division of FrazeMarketing.com
- **Updated**: March 1, 2026

## Services
- [AI Voice & Chat Systems](https://digitalcrunch.com/services/ai-bots/): 24/7 AI voice receptionists, RAG-powered web chat, SMS and social DM agents with CRM integration.
- [AI Voice Receptionist](https://digitalcrunch.com/services/ai-bots/ai-voice-receptionist/): Sub-500ms inbound call handling, appointment booking, lead qualification. Powered by Retell, VAPI, and GoHighLevel.
- [AI Lead Generation](https://digitalcrunch.com/services/ai-lead-generation/): Outbound AI agents across email, SMS, LinkedIn, and social DMs trained on proven sales frameworks.
- [AI Reputation Management](https://digitalcrunch.com/services/ai-reputation/): Automated review campaigns via SMS and email, AI review response, dead lead reactivation through GHL automation.
- [Schema Validation & AEO](https://digitalcrunch.com/services/schema-validation/): JSON-LD implementation, schema drift auditing, llms.txt configuration, ADA compliance review. AEO Certified.
- [AI System Security](https://digitalcrunch.com/services/ai-security/): Prompt injection hardening, data leakage prevention, hallucination guardrails, compliance documentation for customer-facing AI.
- [Custom Automation](https://digitalcrunch.com/services/custom-automation/): Custom workflow builds using n8n, Make, Zapier, Python, Bash, Perl, Docker, Azure Functions, AWS Lambda, Google Sheets, and Apify. API integrations, serverless functions, data pipelines, and system-to-system wiring.

## Technical Research
- [Implement Schema in Hugo](https://digitalcrunch.com/research/schema/implement-schema-in-hugo/): Server-side JSON-LD delivery, entity linking, trust signals, FAQ schema for AI quotability.
- [llms.txt Creation for Hugo](https://digitalcrunch.com/research/schema/llms.txt-creation-for-hugo/): Guide to the llms.txt standard for LLM indexability and brand authority.

## Quick FAQs
- [Squeeze Pages & Landing Pages](https://digitalcrunch.com/research/quick-faqs/squeeze-landing-pages/): Lead capture funnels, GHL page builds, A/B testing, lead magnets, form automation.
- [Follow-Up Systems](https://digitalcrunch.com/research/quick-faqs/follow-up-systems/): Automated SMS and email sequences, A2P 10DLC compliance, speed to lead, reactivation campaigns.
- [Email Deliverability](https://digitalcrunch.com/research/quick-faqs/email-deliverability/): SPF, DKIM, DMARC, domain warmup, blacklist recovery, sending domain strategy.
- [Schema & JSON-LD](https://digitalcrunch.com/research/quick-faqs/schema-json-ld/): Structured data implementation, schema drift, rich results, ADA compliance, AI search citations.
- [llms.txt](https://digitalcrunch.com/research/quick-faqs/llms-txt/): The llms.txt standard for AI indexability, implementation, and maintenance.
- [Hugo Websites](https://digitalcrunch.com/research/quick-faqs/hugo-websites/): Static site architecture, Hugo vs WordPress, Blowfish theme, CDN hosting, GHL integration.
- [Speed Score & Performance](https://digitalcrunch.com/research/quick-faqs/speed-score/): PageSpeed 100s, Core Web Vitals, CDN delivery, mobile-first indexing.
- [Voice Receptionist](https://digitalcrunch.com/research/quick-faqs/voice-receptionist/): Inbound AI call handling, calendar booking, CRM integration, guardrails, multi-language support.
- [Voice AI Bots](https://digitalcrunch.com/research/quick-faqs/voice-ai-bots/): Outbound AI calling, lead follow-up, appointment confirmation, TCPA compliance, objection handling.

## Free Tools
- [Status Dashboard](https://digitalcrunch.com/research/free-tools/status-dashboard/): Real-time monitoring of upstream dependencies including Retell, VAPI, Anthropic, OpenAI, Twilio, GoHighLevel, Cloudflare, and SendGrid.
- [SVG Tracer](https://digitalcrunch.com/research/free-tools/svg-tracer/): Browser-based SVG path coordinate extraction for animation.

## Technology Stack
- **Voice AI**: Retell, VAPI
- **CRM & Automation**: GoHighLevel
- **LLM Backends**: OpenAI, Anthropic, Deepgram
- **Workflow Automation**: n8n, Make.com, Zapier
- **Custom Code**: Python, Bash, Perl, Google Apps Script
- **Serverless**: Azure Functions, AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions, Docker
- **Data Collection**: Apify, custom scrapers
- **Email Delivery**: Mailgun, SendGrid (SPF/DKIM/DMARC)
- **Infrastructure**: Cloudflare, Netlify, DigitalOcean
- **Schema Format**: JSON-LD delivered server-side
- **Site Generator**: Hugo Extended with Blowfish theme
